meta.name: description
meta.content: The Jefferson-Morgan School District is located in the southwestern corner of Pennsylvania. This rural school district is home to students ranging from Pre-Kindergarten through grade twelve.

div.marquee: These uncommon times will require uncommon flexibility; we will get through this together! #JMpride

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1350px; height: 519px;

div.div:
The Jefferson-Morgan School District is located in the southwestern corner of Pennsylvania. This rural school district is home to students ranging from Pre-Kindergarten through grade twelve. The district is comprised of two (2) buildings, the Middle School/High School and the Elementary School, conveniently located in a beautiful campus style setting.
Our mission is to provide a learning environment that permits students to reach their full potential. To this end, we believe that the Jefferson-Morgan School District EXCELS! -Educational eXcellence + Caring Environment + Leadership = Success!
Our district strives to meet the developmental needs of our young adolescents, and it is our belief that the total school staff must function as a team, along with parents, students, and the community, to achieve this goal. The personal attention students receive from our professional staff in this small school district can enhance the intellectual development of students' equivalent to the opportunities available in large systems. This caring and supportive philosophy enhances the social maturation of all students.
Welcome to Rocket Country!

section.p: Click the link above to read more about JM's plan.

h1.a: JM Shutdown - Grab & Go Meal Service - Sign Up Here

section.p: Parents will be able to order lunch during our school closure for children 1-18 years old. We will be prepared to provide a meal for each student signed up beginning on Tuesday, March 17, 2020, weekdays only, through the entire closure. You only need to sign up once and your child will continue to receive meals each day through the remainder of the closure.

address.br:
1351 Jefferson Road, Box 158, Jefferson, PA 15344
Phone: (724) 883-2310
